abstract: Letter from Delaware Gov Jack Markell responds to March 19 editorial calling for efforts to change attitudes of potential employers toward people with criminal records.
lead_paragraph: Gov. Jack A. Markell of Delaware writes that “a valid driver’s license is essential to earning and keeping a job, but wrongheaded policies too often take it away.”

headline.main: End the Loss of Driver’s Licenses for Drug Crimes
headline.print_headline: End the Loss of Driver’s Licenses for Drug Crimes
